message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in efficiency and quality. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8000 to you. Considering its worth to me and the market value, I propose to offer it to you for $10000. This is a fair deal that allows you to acquire a valuable asset while also providing me with a reasonable return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response.
